title: 正版发了一条信息，急求解决
txt_content:
The purchase that gave you access to Minecraft has been reversed upon request. This means that you no longer will be able to play the game.
If you believe that this reversal has been made in error, or have any other questions please contact customer support.
求呀，我正版上都上不去了

replies.author: azs123cvb123
replies.txt_content:
大概意思是说你的账号已被收回，你将不能玩这个游戏，如果你怀疑是正规渠道购买的账号被收回的话，请联系mojang或你的经销商。
你买的也许是黑号，赶紧联系代购方吧

replies.author: 脏脏的小张丶
replies.txt_content: 你帐号还没入正必须去买正版登录器再来入正

replies.author: azs123cvb123
replies.txt_content:
Mojang没有邮箱地址,只有facebook跟twitter
你加关注再发请求吧，虽麻烦，要真有爱的话
http://www.facebook.com/minecraft
https://twitter.com/notch
上不去就翻墙。。。。。。
